sentence: The image is an infographic titled "Educating Girls is Smart, For All of Us."
sentence_cn: 该图是一张信息图，标题为“教育女孩对我们所有人来说都是明智之举”。
words: Educating Girls is Smart, For All of Us.

sentence: It highlights the benefits of educating girls.
sentence_cn: 它强调了教育女孩的好处。

sentence: 1. Introductory Statement: It emphasizes that when a girl is educated, she can break the cycle of poverty in a single generation.
sentence_cn: 1. 引言：它强调，当女孩接受教育时，她可以在一代人的时间内打破贫困的循环。

sentence: It asserts Intel's belief that education is a fundamental right.
sentence_cn: 它体现了英特尔的信念：教育是一项基本权利。

sentence: - It mentions that out of the world's 130 million out-of-school youth, 70% are girls.
sentence_cn: - 其中提到，全球1.3亿失学青少年中，70%是女童。
3. 受过教育的女孩对经济的影响：

sentence: - When a girl goes to school, she will reinvest 90% of her income into her family, compared to 30-40% for a man.
sentence_cn: - 当女孩上学时，她会将90%的收入重新投资于家庭，而男性这一比例仅为30-40%。

sentence: - When 10% more girls attend school, a country¡¯s GDP increases by an average of 3%.
sentence_cn: - 当入学女孩人数增加10%时，一个国家的GDP平均会增加3%。

sentence: - Various icons and graphs such as pie charts and family symbols depict economic reinvestment differences.
sentence_cn: - 饼图和家庭符号等各种图标和图表描绘了经济再投资差异。

sentence: - There are icons illustrating youth and percentages related to girls out of school.
sentence_cn: - 有图标表示失学女孩的青春和百分比。

sentence: - Encourages viewers to find out more at takepart.com/dayofthegirl.
sentence_cn: - 鼓励观众访问 takepart.com/dayofthegirl 了解更多信息。

sentence: - Features logos from Intel and Take Part.
sentence_cn: - 展示英特尔和 Take Part 的标志。

sentence: - Cites Human Rights Watch and Council on Foreign Relations for data references.
sentence_cn: - 引用人权观察和外交关系委员会的数据参考。
